chapter.title: Process Configuration Manager
chapter.para: The central system that receives and collects events is called the Manager.
The Manager configuration process comprises the following:

listitem.para: Download and install packages from our redBorder Community Installer and basic settings
Network Configuration Management: Creating a bonding
Network Setup Service: DNS and domains settings

section.title: Downloading and installing packages of our redBorder Community Installer and basic settings
Basic Settings
section.para: redBorder Community installation comprises a series of installer basic settings:
To begin the installation process and the basic settings that allow the Manager installer settings, you must select 1 Install Manager Community IPS.
Select the language in which you want to operate from now
Choose the type of keyboard you want to use during the process. By default appears the US keyboard [US] because of its ranging compatibility.
Choose and insert a password. This will be the key with which you operate from now on. It can be modified at any time.
Confirm password. Re-enter the password to for verification. If the password is weak or low strength, the program will warn you via a popup window.
If you wish, you can insert a stronger password, or save the current password and change it later by selecting 3 Password, accessible from the configuration menu.
Once you have entered your password and you press the OK button, the system will proceed to create partitions and to install wizard packages on your hard drive.

note.title: Note
note.para: The Manager is configured by default in the time zone UTC to avoid mismatches in timing between the sensors and the Manager, which could cause system errors.

section.title: Installing packages and reboot
section.para: Once you have inserted the password, proceed to “installation” of the redBorder Installler wizard installation package.
Wait until the progress bar tells you that the installation was 100% complete. This process can take up to several minutes.
Don’t press any key or perform any action while viewing the following screens:

Una vez instalados los paquetes, el programa arranca los últimos scripts para finalizar esta etapa. A continuación, comienza el reinicio automático. Durante unos segundos visualizará las siguientes pantallas.
Once the package is installed, the program starts recent scripts to finish this stage. Then begins automatic restart. For a few seconds you will see the following screens.
Do not press any buttons or perform any action until this process is completed.
